ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the "minutes" portion is the top of an hour, ie, ":00"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF ( AND ( TEXT( Courier1__Next_Run_Date__c ) <> "",
MID( TEXT(Courier1__Next_Run_Date__c), 14, 3) <> ":00" ) , true, false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The "minutes" part must be ":00 AM" or ":00 PM". For example, "10:00 AM" is valid, but "10:07 AM" is not.
